p: Overall, 51 papillary thyroid cancer (PC), 23 follicular thyroid cancer (FC), 3 medullary thyroid cancer (MC), 1 poorly differentiated thyroid cancer (PDC), and 17 follicular thyroid adenoma (FA) samples were investigated. There were 21 male and 74 female patients. The mean age of patients was 47 years (range 11â€“88 years). Additionally, 6 healthy thyroid tissue samples from ANTE database [ 45] were used to normalize gene expression levels in molecular pathway analysis. Clinical annotations of tumor specimens investigated are summarized in the Supplementary file 1.
